name: Installing Windows 95 From Floppies
description:
I am not sure why I made this.

If you want to experience installing Windows 95 from floppies, dodgy floppy disk physics and losing your 8th disk under the desk then this is for you.

Mouse wheel to move things closer and further.  Ctrl-Alt-Ins resets the PC as does the power button.   First disk is on the left.
